analysis.key_quote: This regulation seeks to drive out those qualified individuals working under a merit based system, established with civil service reforms starting in 1883 and improved in 1978 with the Civil Service Reform Act, to install political cronies to serve a person/party.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based systems, the potential for increased politicization of civil service, and the loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with themes of protecting civil service integrity.
